MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH49 postcode area of Linlithgow. It Is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7pm due to a fault on the electrical network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:25PM on Wednesday 14 April 2021.
